thought: To craft a stone pickaxe, I need to first craft planks which require wood. I have a crimson stem in slot 32 so I will move that to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_pickaxe

thought: I now have the required planks, but they need to be moved to slot 11 to make room for the sticks.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a stone pickaxe, I need to craft sticks. Sticks require placing planks on top of each other in the crafting grid. I have crimson_planks at slot 11, so I will move them to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stone_pickaxe

Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1
